images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing vibrant beaches and cultural events.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight specific attractions in Thailand, such as popular tourist spots in Bangkok, Phuket, and Krabi, creating a relaxing and inviting atmosphere.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: showcasing Thailand's beautiful beaches, cultural festivals, and autumn scenery
featuring cultural events and serene beach locations

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Осень в Таиланде ждёт!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing vibrant beaches and cultural events.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
